summary: Frontend adds a new /seller/onboarding route, an authenticated+registered-user gate with login-required UI and profile-setup redirect, and a seller onboarding wizard with step configuration and React Query hooks to load/save progress. Backend diff evidence shows new onboarding-related types, but the required backend API methods for fetching/saving onboarding progress are not visible in the provided truncated diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes a query to fetch the callerâ€™s seller onboarding state and an update method to save progress (at minimum: currentStep and updatedAt/lastUpdated).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows new backend types (SellerOnboardingStep, SellerOnboardingProgress) and the frontend calls actor.getOnboarding() / actor.saveOnboarding(...), but the backend method implementations/exports for these APIs are not shown in the provided backend/main.mo truncated excerpt.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds a Seller Onboarding link in the main header navigation (Sellers & Businesses dropdown and mobile views).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked for a new route/page and wizard; it did not request modifying global navigation to add a menu entry.
